meta.content: Digg - What the Internet is talking about right now

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Digg, pictures, technology, breaking news, entertainment, politics, headline news, celebrity news, offbeat, world business, sports, funny videos

meta.name: description
meta.content: The most interesting and talked about stories, videos and pictures on the web. Breaking news on Technology, Politics, Entertainment, and more!

meta.title: Digg - What the Internet is talking about right now

div.div: Mohammed Afar is 11 years old. The modified AK-47 assault rifle he carries stretches to nearly two-thirds his height. “I want to stay as a fighter until Bashar is killed,” he says, referring to Syrian President Bashar al-Assad.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WFDjf1&via=Digg&text=Syria’s 11-Year-Old Killing Machine

div.div: BUY IT WITH TRILLION DOLLAR COIN

div.a: Is There A Case To Be Made For A $10,000 Mobile Phone?

div.div: Why would anyone want to buy a $10,000 mobile phone, like the AE+Y, the Yves Béhar-designed from the upstart mobile outfit Aesir Copenhagen? And why would anyone start a company that tries to make them?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WJvR2C&via=Digg&text=Is There A Case To Be Made For A $10,000 Mobile Phone?

div.div: NOT ENOUGH GOOD GUYS WITH GUNS?

div.a: Gun Shows Ban Loaded Weapons To Promote ‘A Safe Environment’

div.div: If “the only thing that stops a bad guy with a gun is a good guy with a gun,” as the NRA proclaimed in its post-Newtown press conference, why do so many gun shows prohibit attendees from carrying loaded firearms?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WK1bhu&via=Digg&text=Gun Shows Ban Loaded Weapons To Promote ‘A Safe Environment’

div.div: Since his arrest in the early morning of January 11, 2011 — two years to the day before Aaron Swartz ended his life — I have known more about the events that began this spiral than I have wanted to know.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UGZbHs&via=Digg&text=Prosecutor As Bully

div.a: A Quiet Killer: Why Video Games Are So Addictive

div.div: On a Wednesday night in early February 2012, a waitress at a Taiwanese-based internet café made a grim discovery. Chen Rong-yu, a binge gamer, was found dead in the chair from which he’d been engaged in a marathon gaming session.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UZrtTb&via=Digg&text=A Quiet Killer: Why Video Games Are So Addictive

div.div: My friend Aaron Swartz committed suicide yesterday, Jan 11. He was 26. I got woken up with the news about an hour ago.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UdKWvB&via=Digg&text=RIP, Aaron Swartz

div.a: Fossils Suggest 'Hobbits' Once Walked The Earth

div.div: Suddenly, J.R.R. Tolkien's fiction doesn't sound so fantastical. Fossils that suggest hobbit-like humans once roamed have been found on an island that's now part of Indonesia.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/V23Ia4&via=Digg&text=Fossils Suggest 'Hobbits' Once Walked The Earth

div.div: A GOOD MAN IS HARD TO FIND

div.a: Forget Online Dating: Here's Something That Might Really Hurt Monogamy

div.div: The things is, there are much, much bigger social forces at work in this country that could explain Jacob's love life than the irresistible charms of a well-curated Match.com profile.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UdWnTP&via=Digg&text=Forget Online Dating: Here's Something That Might Really Hurt Monogamy

div.a: The Treasury Won't Mint The Trillion Dollar Coin

div.div: The Treasury Department will not mint a trillion-dollar platinum coin to get around the debt ceiling. If they did, the Federal Reserve would not accept it.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RMJ7qL&via=Digg&text=The Treasury Won't Mint The Trillion Dollar Coin

div.div: NOT THE HOVER BOARD, BUT CLOSE

div.a: I Rode The ZBoard In Las Vegas And It Changed My Life

div.div: The ZBoard is an electric skateboard that works like a Segway — leaning forward makes you accelerate, and leaning back slows you down.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WYQ2Kv&via=Digg&text=I Rode The ZBoard In Las Vegas And It Changed My Life

div.div: THE GOVERNMENT'S GOT A SENSE OF HUMOR

div.a: The White House Response To The Death Star Petition Is Amazing

div.div: “The Administration does not support blowing up planets.”

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VYPk08&via=Digg&text=The White House Response To The Death Star Petition Is Amazing

div.a: This Is What Happened When The U.S. Banned Assault Weapons For 10 Years

div.div: During the 10-year federal ban on assault weapons, the percentage of firearms equipped with high-capacity magazines seized by police agencies in Virginia dropped, only to rise sharply once the restrictions were lifted in 2004.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VQyJi1&via=Digg&text=This Is What Happened When The U.S. Banned Assault Weapons For 10 Years

div.a: The Worst U.S. Cities For The Flu Right Now

div.div: The good news is that, for some spots in the country, the worst may be over.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VQqaDS&via=Digg&text=The Worst U.S. Cities For The Flu Right Now

div.a: Apophis Asteroid May Destroy Some Satellites In 2029

div.div: The deadly asteroid Apophis is safely passing by Earth today, more than 9 million miles (14.5 million kilometers) from our home planet. Next time we won't be so lucky. On April 13, 2029, Apophis will come so close that it may destroy satellites in orbit.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VISuGa&via=Digg&text=Apophis Asteroid May Destroy Some Satellites In 2029

div.a: A Desktop Machine To Turn Your Old Plastic Into 3-D Printing Fodder

div.div: As 3-D printing becomes more ubiquitous, we’re going to need stuff out of which to make our 3-D printed toys and gadgets. How about the contents of your recycling bin?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/11gAmJv&via=Digg&text=A Desktop Machine To Turn Your Old Plastic Into 3-D Printing Fodder

div.a: Can Meg Whitman Reverse Hewlett-Packard's Free Fall?

div.div: Things are challenging at HP—more, perhaps, than at any time in its history. Customers are buying less of two of HP’s most important products—PCs and printers—while the company has amassed debt and laid out billions on acquisitions that haven’t worked out. Can Whitman save the company?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RJG4PR&via=Digg&text=Can Meg Whitman Reverse Hewlett-Packard's Free Fall?

div.a: Reddit Cofounder, Digital Activist Commits Suicide

div.div: Aaron Swartz, a programmer and Internet activist who co-founded a company that would eventually grow into Reddit, committed suicide Friday in New York City.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10p0NgY&via=Digg&text=Reddit Cofounder, Digital Activist Commits Suicide

div.div: PORTLAND IS ABOUT TO GET CRAZY

div.a: Software Millionaire John McAfee Says He Is Now Calling Portland Home

div.div: Portland, meet your newest resident: software millionaire John McAfee.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WYd0l0&via=Digg&text=Software Millionaire John McAfee Says He Is Now Calling Portland Home

div.a: Why Does Coffee Make You Poop?

div.div: You know it when you feel it. You've just sat down at your breakfast table, or settled in at your favorite café. You're a few sips into your brew when, out of nowhere, the urge to download a brownload is becoming urgent. Just a few swigs of coffee and it can feel like you like you've mainlined a laxative — but why?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VQnh68&via=Digg&text=Why Does Coffee Make You Poop?

div.a: The Geopolitics Of Adoption After The Kremlin's Bizarre Ban

div.div: Where will America's next wave of adoptive babies come from?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Xryitm&via=Digg&text=The Geopolitics Of Adoption After The Kremlin's Bizarre Ban

div.div: January is the month when gyms make all sorts of offers aimed at those who are newly committed to getting lean. E at Equinox, however, is all about exclusivity — and the jaw-dropping price tag that goes along with it.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VXHvrt&via=Digg&text=The $25,000 Gym Membership

div.div: On January 13th, the National Geographic Society will celebrate its 125th anniversary. In celebration, they have shared some images that represent their favorite moments of discovery.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VsfCex&via=Digg&text=125 Years Of National Geographic Photography

div.a: Why Are Chimps Stronger Than Humans?

div.div: The last several years have seen a number of horrific maulings at the hands of chimpanzees. How can animals that share 99 percent of their genes with us, yet are only a fraction of our weight, possess such amazing strength?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UbZTOw&via=Digg&text=Why Are Chimps Stronger Than Humans?

div.a: Larry Page Ignored Steve Jobs’s Deathbed Advice, And Google Is Doing Great

div.div: Shortly after Larry Page re-took the reigns as CEO of Google in April 2011, many looked upon his re-organization of the company and sun-setting of fringe products as proof that he was heeding Steve Job’s death-bed advice to bring more focus to the company.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VZr79U&via=Digg&text=Larry Page Ignored Steve Jobs’s Deathbed Advice, And Google Is Doing Great

div.a: Does Facebook Auto-Delete Content After A Certain Period Of Time?

div.div: How long do status updates, text, photos, et cetera, stay on Facebook?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VRiwqM&via=Digg&text=Does Facebook Auto-Delete Content After A Certain Period Of Time?

div.a: A Former Lobbyist Talks About The Horrifying Things He Used To Do For A Living

div.div: "In the old days back when Lyndon Johnson was majority leader in the Senate, you would come into his office. He had a shoebox. And you'd deposit money, maybe $100,000 to get what you wanted."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TPouKf&via=Digg&text=A Former Lobbyist Talks About The Horrifying Things He Used To Do For A Living

div.a: The Best And Worst Treasury Secretary Signatures

div.div: Get ready to see this beauty on your cash every time you go to the ATM. It really makes one wonder if President Obama had ever seen Jack Lew's signature before tapping him to be the next Treasury secretary.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UF6gID&via=Digg&text=The Best And Worst Treasury Secretary Signatures

div.a: The Lessons Of The Steubenville Rape Case

div.div: We worry that everyone surrenders too much of their privacy on social media but, without the oversharing, things in Steubenville, Ohio, might have gone very differently.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VXZoGs&via=Digg&text=The Lessons Of The Steubenville Rape Case

div.a: Rare Photo Of The Mushroom Cloud Over Hiroshima Discovered

div.div: In the center of Hiroshima, in a part of the city totally destroyed by the explosion and ensuing fires, a long-lost photograph taken shortly after the blast has been discovered among a collection of articles about the bombing.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/V18K6R&via=Digg&text=Rare Photo Of The Mushroom Cloud Over Hiroshima Discovered

div.a: Online Pick-Up Artists Have Infiltrated Snapchat

div.div: It was only a matter of time before the pick-up artists got ahold of Snapchat. Pick-up artist messageboards and subreddits have lit up in the last month with discussion on how to use the newly popular photo messaging app to their advantage.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Uc2pV0&via=Digg&text=Online Pick-Up Artists Have Infiltrated Snapchat
